text:
Vidya starts shooting for Kahaani 2

Actor Vidya Balan has started shooting for the upcoming second instalment of the Hindi mystery thriller Kahaani .

The Paa star is shooting in Kalimpong, a hill station in West Bengal.

She tweeted on Sunday that the team has started the shooting. “First day off during the ‘Kahaani 2’ shoot. The trees in Kalimpong seem to be swaying to Gulzarsaab’s Musafir hoon yaaron. Just who isn’t a fan?!” Kahaani revolved around a pregnant woman named Vidya Bagchi, who comes to Kolkata from London in search of a man. The movie also featured Parambrata Chatterjee, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Indraneil Sengupta, Dhritiman Chatterjee and Saswata Chatterjee.

— IANS
title: Vidya Balan starts shooting for Kahaani 2 in West Bengal
